attributes.action: Open visa section at British embassy in Kabul Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
currently do not have visa section to issue visa there for all Afghans who want to apply for UK visa has been force to travel to Pakistan and apply at the British High Commission in Islamabad. Travelling to Pakistan is full of danger now a days specially travelling tough the south West frontier province of Pakistan and harsh treatment of Afghans by the Pakistani authority especially at the Thurkham Border crossing.
As British citizens we are kindly asking the Prim Minister Gordon Brown to look at the problems we face and ask the Foreign and Commonwealth Office to open the visa section at the British Embassy in Kabul, this will reduce the work load on the Entry Clearance Officer in British High Commission in Islamabad and off course solve all our problems we face currently.
